power.title: Climber's Claws
power.level:
6/level> Thick claws spring from your hands, allowing you to scale surfaces quickly
Encounter Primal Minor Action Personal
true Effect: bold Until the end of your next turn, you gain a climb speed equal to your speed.
Special: bold You can use this power as part of a short rest. If you do, it lasts for one hour, but immediately ends if you enter combat.
